title: Football Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the standalone Football Scoreboard plugin - supports NFL and NCAA Football

enabled.description: Enable or disable the football scoreboard plugin

display_duration.description: Duration in seconds to display each game

nfl_recent_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of recent NFL games to display

nfl_upcoming_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of upcoming NFL games to display

nfl_show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show games from favorite NFL teams

nfl_show_all_live.description: Show all live NFL games, not just favorites

nfl_show_odds.description: Show betting odds for NFL games

nfl_update_interval_seconds.description: How often to fetch NFL data (seconds)

nfl_live_update_interval.description: Update interval for live NFL games (seconds)

nfl_live_game_duration.description: Duration to display each live NFL game (seconds)

nfl_logo_dir.description: Directory path for NFL team logos

ncaa_fb_favorite_teams.description: List of favorite NCAA FB teams (e.g. ['UGA', 'AUB', 'BAMA'])

ncaa_fb_display_modes_recent.description: Show recently completed NCAA FB games

ncaa_fb_recent_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of recent NCAA FB games to display

ncaa_fb_upcoming_games_to_show.description: Maximum number of upcoming NCAA FB games to display

ncaa_fb_show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show games from favorite NCAA FB teams

ncaa_fb_show_all_live.description: Show all live NCAA FB games, not just favorites

ncaa_fb_show_odds.description: Show betting odds for NCAA FB games

ncaa_fb_test_mode.description: Enable test mode for NCAA FB (development)

ncaa_fb_update_interval_seconds.description: How often to fetch NCAA FB data (seconds)

ncaa_fb_live_update_interval.description: Update interval for live NCAA FB games (seconds)

ncaa_fb_live_game_duration.description: Duration to display each live NCAA FB game (seconds)

ncaa_fb_logo_dir.description: Directory path for NCAA FB team logos
